description: Lists the existing custom verification email templates for your account in the current Amazon Web Services Region. For more information about custom verification email templates, see Using Custom Verification Email Templates in the Amazon SES Developer Guide. You can execute this operation no more than once per second.

nested_items.name: CustomVerificationEmailTemplates
nested_items.description: A list of the custom verification email templates that exist in your account.

nested_items.name: TemplateName
nested_items.description: The name of the custom verification email template.

nested_items.name: FromEmailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address that the custom verification email is sent from.

nested_items.name: TemplateSubject
nested_items.description: The subject line of the custom verification email.

nested_items.name: SuccessRedirectionURL
nested_items.description: The URL that the recipient of the verification email is sent to if his or her address is successfully verified.

nested_items.name: FailureRedirectionURL
nested_items.description: The URL that the recipient of the verification email is sent to if his or her address is not successfully verified.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token indicating that there are additional custom verification email templates available to be listed. Pass this token to a subsequent call to ListTemplates to retrieve the next 50 custom verification email templates.
